body:
Also I've provided a test which demonstrates that now different stores work with domain :all option (if they inherit from `ActionDispatch::Session::AbstractStore` as they should) https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/7316/files#L2R260.

And as I previously wrote the bug is easily reproduced on rails without patch with following commands:

```bash
rails new foobar
cd foobar
rails generate scaffold post
rake db:sessions:create db:migrate
sed -i '' "s/cookie_store.*/active_record_store, key: '_foobar_session', domain: :all/" config/initializers/session_store.rb
rails server # open http://localhost:3000/posts
```
it will show exception `can't convert Symbol into String (TypeError)`

But with this patch the exception is prevented and all works as supposed to.

This all was already discussed with @josevalim that's why he merged the original pull-request into master. All I do in this pull-request is backporting it to 3.2-stable. So I don't see what's the reason to question it if all the tests (including new ones) pass.
